title: Bug 121352The data set binding property cannot be retrieved in report preview layout
description: You can refer to the attachment.
OB: Bug 121352The data set binding property cannot be retrieved in report preview layout In report preview page, the datasource/dataset property binding lists cannot be retrieved.The dataset binding can not work correctly in layout preview because it's value cannot get from the binding list. But in the data set edit page, the binding value can be got.
